# ESG REPORTING & DISCLOSURE

2023 Snacking Made Right Report

The Snacking Made Right Report showcases the meaningful annual progress against our Environmental, Social and Governance (ESG) priorities. The report demonstrates our continuing efforts to build a more sustainable snacking company, focused on offering the right snack, for the right moment, made the right way. This year’s report is part of our ongoing effort to provide our stakeholders with transparent, measurable information on our ESG goals*, policies, initiatives, and programs. 

"With 2030 on the horizon and 2025 quickly approaching, I’m genuinely inspired by the progress the Mondelēz International team has made over the past year to drive our upcoming goals and have a clear plan to achieve our long-term ambitions. The world is changing rapidly, demanding that we change with it. We are committed to working collaboratively on interrelated systemic issues across the sector to deliver impact."

CHRISTINE MONTENEGRO MCGRATH, SVP, Chief Impact & Sustainability Officer

## 2023 Highlights

We are proud of our work in 2023 to continue meeting evolving consumer preferences and delivering strong results while making meaningful progress against our ESG priorities. Below are 2023 highlights with more progress available on the [Goals & Progress](/snacking-made-right/reporting-and-disclosure/goals-and-progress/) page.
